question_text: A technician is preparing to update firmware on several networked printers. Which two steps should they complete first to ensure a smooth update process? (Select two)
answer_options: Verify the model and current firmware version
Back up print jobs in the queue
Download the correct update from the manufacturer’s website
correct_answer: Verify the model and current firmware version
Download the correct update from the manufacturer’s website
explanation: Identifying the correct printer model and current firmware version ensures you select the correct update. Always download firmware directly from the official vendor source.
